project_descr: This project aims at building the resilience of countries in the face of disasters by strengthening national capacities to plan and manage recovery processes in a sustainable and inclusive manner (“Build Back Better”).

outputs.output_descr: Building the resilience of countries in the face of disasters by strengthening national capacities to plan and manage recovery processes in a sustainable and inclusive manner (“Build Back Better”).

project_title: building capacities for resilient recovery- phase ii
